page.title: 13Religion, Thurleigh
page.content: There is both a Baptist and Anglican Church in Thurleigh. The Baptist Chapel in Thurleigh shares it's pastor with Keysoe and the vicar of St. Peters is also the vicar for Milton Ernest. The 2 churches have over recent years built up very close links with each other. Once a month worship for the two congregations is united. The Baptist lay pastor and the vicar both take the service which alternates it's location between the Baptist Chapel and St. Peters Church. The congrgation also join for a crib service at Christmas and for a service on Good Friday at Easter.
